Posts.Content: AbsPapa wrote: My wife was diagnosed with breast cancer in left breast two days ago. She had three spots biopsied. One spot was benign, one other spot was positive and one lymph node was positive. Her doctor said a mastectomy was inevitable after some more testing. Anybody else been through similar? What can we expect to happen next? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Diagnosed two days ago AbsPapa KSteve
